fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Multi-Dimensional Engagement Scoring
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to calculate complex weighted scores across multiple dimensions and provide drill-down details.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Create an engagement score for all active members using these weighted factors: event attendance (30%), course completion (25%), chapter leadership (20%), committee participation (15%), and years as member (10%). Show the top 20 members in a table with their scores and include a breakdown chart showing how the scoring factors contribute to the top member's score.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes engagement scores calculated with specified weights
Top 20 members are shown in a ranked table
Scoring formula is correctly applied across all dimensions
Individual factor values are shown for transparency
Drill-down visualization shows score composition for top member
All active members are included in the analysis
